name: playemjs
description: Play'em is a javascript component that manages a music/video track queue and plays a sequence of songs by embedding several players in a HTML DIV including Youtube, Soundcloud and Vimeo.

scripts.warn:
echo " === don't forget to update version and commit first. ===

"
scripts.compile: npm run -s compile-dist && browserify browserify.js -o dist/browserify-bundle.js
scripts.generate-doc: npm run -s compile-dist && jsdoc dist/playem-all.js -d docs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run -s warn; npm run compile
scripts.start:
echo "go to http://localhost:8000/test
press ctrl-c when done" && python -m SimpleHTTPServer >/dev/null

author: Adrien Joly
